[00:00.00]broken - lovelytheband
[00:05.72]Written by：Christian Medice/Mitchell Collins
[00:11.45]I like that you're broken
[00:13.56]Broken like me
[00:14.94]
[00:15.50]Maybe that makes me a fool
[00:17.83]
[00:19.29]I like that you're lonely
[00:21.45]Lonely like me
[00:22.68]
[00:23.39]I could be lonely with you
[00:25.55]
[00:26.45]I met you late night at a party
[00:30.15]Some trust fund baby's Brooklyn loft
[00:33.49]
[00:34.27]By the bathroom you said let's talk
[00:37.30]
[00:38.14]But my confidence is wearing off
[00:41.37]

[00:43.62]
